Package library

Class Library

java.lang.Object
library.Library
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILibraryManagement
public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILibraryManagement
Class to represent a Library. The shelves clients and sections are represented and there are methods to add publications/clients/sections to the library.
Author:
George Paul

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Vector<AbstractClient> clientList
    Vector to represent the list of clients of the Library.
    private Dictionary<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> idToString
    Dictionary so that searchStrings can be found from ids, this enables methods that take ids as arguments to search the shelves dictionary using a searchString.
    private int nextAvailableClientId
    int to represent the next available id for clients.
    private Graph<java.lang.String> sections
    Graph to store sections, graph allows linking of sections
    private Dictionary<java.lang.String,​Publication> shelves
    Dictionary to store the publications in so that strings can be searched for in O(log(n)) time (if tree is balanced).

    Constructor method.

  • Field Details

    • shelves

      private Dictionary<java.lang.String,​Publication> shelves
      Dictionary to store the publications in so that strings can be searched for in O(log(n)) time (if tree is balanced). Disadvantage is that multiple copies of same publication cannot be stored unless different name used.

    • idToString

      private Dictionary<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> idToString
      Dictionary so that searchStrings can be found from ids, this enables methods that take ids as arguments to search the shelves dictionary using a searchString.

    • clientList

      private Vector<AbstractClient> clientList
      Vector to represent the list of clients of the Library. Vector so that clients can be address in O(1) time by id which is just their index + 1.

    • sections

      private Graph<java.lang.String> sections
      Graph to store sections, graph allows linking of sections

    • nextAvailableClientId

      private int nextAvailableClientId
      int to represent the next available id for clients.

      public Library()
      Constructor method.

      Method to add a Book to the Library
      Specified by:
      addBook in interface ILibraryManagement
      Parameters:
      author - Name of the author
      title - Title of the book
      yearOfPublication - Year the book was published
      Returns:
      id of the book, -1 if book is already in library

      Parameters:
      publicationID - publication id to return.
      Returns:

    • connectSections

      public void connectSections​(java.lang.String section1, java.lang.String section2)
      Method to add a connection between sections, all connections are given equal weight and are bi-directional
      Specified by:
      connectSections in interface ILibraryManagement
      Parameters:
      section1 - Starting section
      section2 - Ending section

    • findShortestPath

      public void findShortestPath​(int publicationID, java.lang.String startSection)
      Method to print the shortest path from a section to a section where a publication is held
      Specified by:
      findShortestPath in interface ILibraryManagement
      Parameters:
      publicationID - Id of the publication whose section is to be navigated to.
      startSection - Name of the section to begin in
